cookingTips: Knead the dough for at least 5 minutes to develop gluten and create tender chapati
Roll dough balls evenly thin, about ⅛ inch thick, for uniform cooking
Cook on a hot skillet until light brown spots appear on both sides
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Have you made flatbreads before? Whole wheat chapati requires less kneading than white flour breads. Dough should feel slightly tacky but manageable.
